divs: Sighting DetailsWe have multiple photos of multiple UFO's taken in various directions of the Sacramento night sky. Two of the people are known in the UFO community thru work at the UFO Congress, one is a reporter specializing in UFO's. We all saw the same things throughout the sky. There is video and photos and first hand accounts avail from four people. From what the two in the UFO community said, the sky was VERY active and the experience was amazing. Two of us have witnessed, recorded and noted these events since our initial report May 9, 2009. Multiple objects of variable shapes, brightnesses and appearance. The image attached was taken some time in the last few months but, we did see this one on Friday night along with many others.
Summary: There were four of us with photography equipment a lot of activity over several hours
